Name: tmplname
column6: name of the language this template is for

Name: tmpltrusted
column6: true if language is considered trusted

Name: tmpldbacreate
column6: true if language may be created by a database owner

Name: tmplinline
column6: name of anonymous-block handler function, or null if none

Name: tmplvalidator
column6: name of validator function, or null if none

Name: tmpllibrary
column6: path of shared library that implements language

Name: tmplacl
column6: access privileges for template (not actually used)
